property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, the directional feather effect is applied. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: leftWidth
property.shortdesc: The feather width (in pixels) on the left side of the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rightWidth
property.shortdesc: The feather width (in pixels) on the right side of the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. (Range: .2 to 250). Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: topWidth
property.shortdesc: The feather width (in pixels) on the top side of the object FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. (Range: .2 to 250). Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: bottomWidth
property.shortdesc: The feather width (in pixels) on the bottom side of the object FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. (Range: .2 to 250). Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: chokeAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount to choke the directional feather (as a percentage of the feather width). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The angle of the feather. (Range: 180 to -180). Can return: Real (-180 - 180) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: followShapeMode
property.shortdesc: The shape-following algorithm applied to the feather. Can return: FollowShapeModeOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: noise
property.shortdesc: The amount of noise (as a percentage) applied to the feather region. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
